synthesis_title: The Neurological Nexus: Dissolution of Subjective-Objective Reality
core_concept: The brain is the biological interface where subjective (A) and objective (B) realities are mutually generated and constrained. Their final uncoupling during death creates the subjective experience of an 'afterlife'.

nexus.physical: Classical, Deterministic World (B) gives rise to Probabilistic, Observer-Dependent Reality (A) in quantum mechanics.

tension.description: They are two irreconcilable descriptions of the same system. Free Will is the subjective experience of the brain's integrative decision-making, which from the outside is a complex causal chain of predetermination.

afterlife_process.description: The uncoupling of A from B during brain death.
objective_unraveling_B: Neurotransmitter surge from dying cell vacuoles.
Hyperactivation/stimulation of the Default Mode Network (DMN).
Potential uncontrolled release/flood of endogenous neuromodulators (e.g., DMT).

subjective_storm_A.life_review: Fragmentation and chaotic replay of the episodic memory networks all firing at once in cascade.
subjective_storm_A.timelessness: Collapse of temporal integration mechanisms (e.g., thalamocortical loops).
subjective_storm_A.mystical_unity: DMN-driven self-dissolution & sensory cortex chaos generating visions of light, entities, and transcendence.
subjective_storm_A.positive_heaven: Life lived in self joy, happiness, and peace, yeilds a more positive encoded cascade flood of neurotransmitters.
subjective_storm_A.negative_hell: Life lived in self denial, regret, anger, yeilds a more negitive encoded cascade flood neurotransmitters.

in_life.relationship: A and B are two sides of one coin in a feedback loop. Perception is a 'controlled hallucination' constrained by sensory input.

in_death.process: B (Objective Biology) undergoes one-way degeneration. A (Subjective Reality) experiences this collapse from the inside as a hyper-real, decomposing narrativeâ€”the 'afterlife'.

synthesis_pattern.final_conclusion: The 'afterlife' is not an arrival but the process of un-becoming. It is the subjective reality of the objective brain's terminal physics. The philosophical nexus disintegrates, and its final signal is the ultimate subjective illusion: a transcendent odyssey born from cellular death.
